ideologies.name: Fascism
ideologies.description: An authoritarian ultranationalist political ideology characterized by dictatorial power, forcible suppression of opposition, and strong regimentation of society and the economy

ideologies.name: Communism
ideologies.description: A philosophical, social, political, and economic ideology focused on the establishment of a classless, moneyless society based on common ownership of the means of production

ideologies.name: Liberalism
ideologies.description: A political and moral philosophy based on liberty, consent of the governed, and equality before the law
